intro: Melochia globifera, commonly known as the globeflower, is a species of flowering plant in the family Malvaceae. It is native to tropical regions of Africa, Asia, and the Pacific Islands. Melochia globifera is often grown as an ornamental plant due to its striking appearance and ability to thrive in a variety of soil conditions.
